title: CREAM Mobile Application

title: HiVAMS Hyundai Intelligent Vessel Asset Management System
description:
HiVAMS is a ship asset management system designed for efficient management of overall operations including supply, maintenance work, purchase management, stock, and cost management by assigning codes to all equipment and facilities on board.
•Reduction of paper work from both onboard and ashore •Elimination of filing errors & reduction in paper chasing •Automatic identification of task specialists
